description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he focuses on transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa works on bringing people together around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like decentralization, digital fragmentation, and ecosystem architecture, drawing from diverse fields such as philosophy, technology, and sustainability. yeehaa's articles and courses cover topics ranging from internet culture and innovation to collaborative practices and regenerative design.
blurb: yeehaa: ecosystem architect, PhD philosopher, and tech entrepreneur. Explores decentralization, digital fragmentation, and ecosystem architecture. Advocates for inclusive internet and transformative education. Blends academia, technology, and sustainability in innovative ways.
